p: As the results of these tests can be used to improve our knowledge of the epidemiology of the disease, the test subject will have to fill in a questionnaire indicating essential data (sex, age, weight and height, blood pressure, occupation, place of residence, present or previous illnesses, treatments followed). The questionnaires and test results will be sent to Sant√© France, which will use them anonymously. Therefore, it is better that the tests are carried out on prescription in a medical analysis laboratory with the results sent to the doctor.
